Our products and services

Innovative and tailor-made solutions 

Fareva offers you tailor-made solutions which are designed to meet your needs.

Process control for all types of technologies and dosage forms.

Find out more about our solutions
12
 

Fareva GROUP

A worldwide, independent and family group, founded in 1981 by Bernard Fraisse 

  €1.65 billion turnover in 2018

  40 production sites

  12,000 employees

Find out more about Fareva, one of the world’s leading subcontractors in the industrial field, and how we can help you

Fareva, group with a global presence

Present on 3 continents

 

Each day Fareva relies on its industrial, commercial, and R&D structures

to support your global ambitions

and provide you with the appropriate solutions for your markets,

in 11 countries around the world.

Discover the best site to research, manufacture and package your products

Do you share our passion for action ?

Join a global, dynamic, innovative and responsible group!

At Fareva you will find a working environment where the fundamental values are cooperation and respect: a company where you can express your ideas and achieve your projects, with passion.

Join us!
